entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Metatada file "MyApp.dll" could not be found, on all default solutions on Visual Studio Mac #11567
  • [WiP] KeyboardManager for interacting with platform keyboard #11565
    Backlog
  • ITextInput.ShowSoftInputOnFocus to indicate if you want the keyboard to display when a control becomes focused #11562
    Backlog
  • [iOS / macOS] scrollview/collectionview don't render behind tabs #11561
    Backlog
  • Swapping MainPage performance ( black screen) #11560
    Backlog
  • Carousel view not updating it's position on initial interaction #11559
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Scrollviewer not scrolling #11558
    Backlog
  • ContentView Touch Interaction works inappropriately when placing one above another ContentView. #11555
    Backlog
  • [Android] Toolbar item icon and text disappears when reopening from recent applications. #11552
  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android. Re-introduced #11549
    Backlog
  • Running on windows 11 doesn't live up to expectations, but Android is right #11547

Closed

  • Text input of Entry and Editor break modal visualization #7861
  • .net maui android app not working when deployed to play store when using firebase nuget packages #11538
  • FileSavePicker throws "Invalid window handle" error #11527
    Backlog
  • Unpackaged app compilation fail due to space in profile name #11518
  • .NET Maui on dotnet 7.0 Windows platform (WindowsApplicationSDK 1.1.5) crashes with System.ExecutionEngineException in Application.Start in Main #11546
  • Stepper IsEnabled can't be changed at runtime on Android #11050
    Backlog
  • Can't change ImageSource on Button on Android #8459
    Backlog
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible should accept a "BindableObject" (i.e. it should be data bound) #10960
    Backlog
  • [Bug] When navigating the page as PushModelAsync, the content page background color is always black even when the content page background color is set as transparent. #11040
    Backlog
  • IOS Contentpage BackgroundColor Transparent not working #8526
  • ocr for dotnet MAUI #11480
  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android. Re-introduced #11551
  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android. Re-introduced #11550
  • iOS build: the "-gcc_flags -dead_strip" Mtouch argument doesn't work #11477
  • Adding 365 Views in a Grid takes forever #7916
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Make iOS Label HTML behavior compatible with Forms #11569

Merged

  • [Android] Fix Stepper IsEnabled property changes #11053
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-stepper
  • Notify Button ImageSource changes correctly #11146
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Run dotnet format on Microsoft.Maui.sln #11110
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Reboot on-prem agent after job completion #11359
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Possible fix for issue #10960 #11361
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11193
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update Essentials DeviceDisplay API Docs #11429
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials DeviceInfo API Docs #11431
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Allow transparent modal pages #11107
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221109.1 to 1.2.221116.1 #11469
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11390
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Add .NET 7 announcement #11539
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update Essentials Compass API Docs #11414
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    area/TabbedPage
  • Update GridExtensions.cs to compatible with Xamarin #9891
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11034
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • Update Editor.cs To solve HorizontalTextAlignment problem #10981
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • ItemContentControl - apply bindings once for ItemTemplate (Windows) #10999
    community ✨
  • _itemsSource may be null in CarouselViewLoopManager #11000
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Fix being unable to access some resources #11214
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #11314
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Fix issue loading local files in WebView #10804
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Align Shapes Fill property behavior with Xamarin.Forms #10328
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #11438
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    area/a11y, area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix crash using Page IsBusy property #9783
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, control-frame, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix Entry placeholder position using VerticalTextAlignment #8684
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Move init to mapper and move test components to reusable test runner library #10751
